title: Hat, 1900–62
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
description: Constructed cap of batik fabric. Fully lined, pleated at the front, stuffed knob at back, with bright blue inset at ears. Fabric batiked in brown, dark blue, and off-white showing sawat (two wings of Garuda, mount of Vishnu) motif among organic off-white dots on brown ground

tombstone.epitaph:
Hat, 1900–62.Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave. 1962-177-1.
